Title: Rivera Gold Tone American Pride Pocket Watch
Description: Rivera Gold Tone American Pride Pocket Watch This is a Rivera quartz gold tone pocket watch with a chain fob and an American Flag on the front with a white background reading "American Pride".   This watch needs batteries and comes with a 14.25" fob. It measures 2 3/4" long and 1 7/8" across the face. SHIPPING INFORMATION Buyers in The Continental U.S. will pay $4.99 shipping and handling. Charity.Mission: MacHub is a division of Yamhill County Gospel Rescue Mission. MacHub partners with YCGRM to provide needed shelter, support, hope, and job opportunities.
